languages.text: "Бедняжка, сейчас разрыдаюсь — тяжко тебе пришлось, резать людей перестать не мог! Даже мои голосочки притихли от этой вшивой сказочки. Думают, поди, какой же ты грязный самовлюбленный ублюдок!"

"Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"
languages.original_text: "Бедняжка, сейчас разрыдаюсь — тяжко тебе пришлось, резать людей перестать не мог! Даже мои голосочки притихли от этой вшивой сказочки. Думают, поди, какой же ты грязный самовлюбленный ублюдок!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm going to cry. You couldn't stop cutting people, it must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed piece of scum!'"

"Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"

languages.text: « Oh, pauvre créature, ça me donnerait presque envie de pleurer. Vous ne pouviez pas vous empêcher de découper les gens ? Comme ça a dû être difficile ! Franchement, même mes murmures restent sans voix face à une histoire aussi pitoyable. Elles doivent se dire "Quel tas de merde puante et égoïste !" »
languages.original_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, pauvre créature, ça me donnerait presque envie de pleurer. Vous ne pouviez pas vous empêcher de découper les gens ? Comme ça a dû être difficile ! Franchement, même mes murmures restent sans voix face à une histoire aussi pitoyable. Elles doivent se dire "Quel tas de merde puante et égoïste !" »

languages.text: «Ay, qué penita, creo que voy a llorar y todo. ¡No podía parar de rajar a la gente! ¡Qué mal lo ha debido de pasar! Hasta mis susurros se han quedado sin palabras con ese cuento tan patético. Seguro que están pensando "¡qué sabandija más asquerosa y egocéntrica!"».
languages.original_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"

traits.locale_text: «Ay, qué penita, creo que voy a llorar y todo. ¡No podía parar de rajar a la gente! ¡Qué mal lo ha debido de pasar! Hasta mis susurros se han quedado sin palabras con ese cuento tan patético. Seguro que están pensando "¡qué sabandija más asquerosa y egocéntrica!"».

languages.text: 「あぁ、可哀想に、涙が出るわ。人斬りを辞められなかったのね！さぞ辛かったでしょう！私の囁きも、そんな悲しい話に言葉も出ないみたい。きっと'最低最悪、自己中のクズ野郎！'と思っているのね」
languages.original_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、可哀想に、涙が出るわ。人斬りを辞められなかったのね！さぞ辛かったでしょう！私の囁きも、そんな悲しい話に言葉も出ないみたい。きっと'最低最悪、自己中のクズ野郎！'と思っているのね」

languages.text: “哎哟，你可真是太可怜了，听得我都要掉眼泪了。你真的克制不住想要把别人切成肉块的欲望，你是真的尽力了！这对你来说简直是太难熬了！这么让人心碎的故事，就连那些低语声也不知该说些什么才好。我敢说它们心里肯定在想，‘这家伙真是个自私自利的人渣，无药可救！’”
languages.original_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"

traits.locale_text: “哎哟，你可真是太可怜了，听得我都要掉眼泪了。你真的克制不住想要把别人切成肉块的欲望，你是真的尽力了！这对你来说简直是太难熬了！这么让人心碎的故事，就连那些低语声也不知该说些什么才好。我敢说它们心里肯定在想，‘这家伙真是个自私自利的人渣，无药可救！’”

languages.text: "Oh, armes Wesen, ich muss gleich weinen. Ihr konntet einfach nicht aufhören, Leute aufzuschlitzen! Das muss sehr hart für Euch gewesen sein! Selbst mein Flüstern hat keinen Kommentar zu einer derart jämmerlichen Geschichte. Vermutlich denkt es: 'Was für ein lausiger, egozentrischer Abschaum!'"
languages.original_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"

Selbst mein Flüstern hat keinen Kommentar zu einer derart jämmerlichen Geschichte. Vermutlich denkt es: 'Was für ein lausiger, egozentrischer Abschaum!'"

languages.text: "Ah be yavrucak. Gözümden yaş gelecek şimdi. Doğramışsın herkesi! Ne büyük zorluk! Böyle zavallıca bir öyküye fısıltılarım bile sessiz kalır. Eminim 'Ne iğrenç, bencil bir pislikmiş bu.' diye düşünüyorlardır."
languages.original_text: "Oh, you poor thing, I think I'm gonna cry. You couldn't stop slicing people up! That must have been so hard for you! Even my whispers have nothing to say to a pathetic tale like that. I bet they're thinking, 'What a lousy, self-absorbed sack of scum!'"
